product_name: Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke Paddling Jacket - Women's
long_description: An end result of real paddlers using, tweaking, and retweaking a design until it's just right, the women's Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket shelters you from the storm. Hydrus 3L waterproof breathable coating keeps you dry in high seas and extreme weather. Outer nylon fabric face resists abrasion and inner knit lining moves moisture away from skin. Latex neck and wrist gaskets seal with skin to help keep water out. Keep a key or another small item in the self-draining chest pocket. Factory sealed seams enhance dryness of the Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket.
short_description: An end result of real paddlers using, tweaking, and retweaking a design until it's just right, the women's Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket shelters you from the storm.
